articles.title: Fabrizio Romano claims Man Utd have made approach to sign 'special' £56m striker - United In Focus - Manchester United FC News
articles.description: Manchester United have made an approach for RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko and are seemingly waiting for his decision.
articles.content:
Manchester United are expected to invest in a new striker this summer and we are seeing all different types of forwards being linked towards Old Trafford.
The summer transfer window is upon us and i… [+3185 chars]
